TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CustomValidator extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator

summary.span: 在輸入控制項上執行使用者定義的驗證。

span.span: Performs user-defined validation on an input control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用控制項提供輸入控制項的使用者定義的驗證函式。Use the control to provide a user-defined validation function for an input control. 控制項是它會驗證，這可讓您控制要在顯示驗證訊息的輸入控制項的個別控制項。The control is a separate control from the input control it validates, which allows you to control where the validation message is displayed. 驗證控制項一律會在伺服器上執行驗證。Validation controls always perform validation on the server. 他們也擁有完整的用戶端實作，可讓指令碼啟用瀏覽器 （例如 Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 和更新版本） 用戶端上執行驗證。They also have complete client-side implementation that allows script-enabled browsers (such as Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 and later) to perform validation on the client. 用戶端驗證，以增強驗證程序傳送到伺服器之前，請檢查使用者輸入。Client-side validation enhances the validation process by checking user input before it is sent to the server. 這可讓之前提交表單，以避免往返伺服器端驗證所需資訊的用戶端上偵測到的錯誤。This allows errors to be detected on the client before the form is submitted, thus avoiding the round trip of information necessary for server-side validation. 若要建立伺服器端驗證函式，提供的處理常式執行驗證的事件。To create a server-side validation function, provide a handler for the event that performs the validation. 若要驗證的輸入控制項中的字串可以存取使用屬性物件傳遞至事件處理常式做為參數。The string from the input control to validate can be accessed by using the property of the object passed into the event handler as a parameter. 驗證的結果會儲存在屬性物件。The result of the validation is then stored in the property of the object. 若要建立用戶端驗證函式，請先新增稍早所述的伺服器端驗證函式。To create a client-side validation function, first add the server-side validation function described earlier. 接下來，將用戶端驗證指令碼函式加入至網頁 (.aspx)。Next, add the client-side validation script function to the ASP.NET (.aspx) page. 如果您使用 Visual Basic Scripting Edition (VBScript)，函式必須是這種形式：If you are using Visual Basic Scripting Edition (VBScript), the function must be in this form: ``` Sub ValidationFunctionName(source, arguments) ``` 如果您使用的 JScript，函式必須是這種形式：If you are using JScript, the function must be in this form: ``` function ValidationFunctionName(source, arguments) ``` `source`參數是參考\ 項目呈現為控制項。The `source` parameter is a reference to the \ element rendered for the control. 這可讓您以程式設計方式控制\ 標記，例如修改屬性。This allows you to programmatically control the \ tag, such as modifying the attribute. `arguments`參數是具有兩個屬性的物件： 值和 IsValid。The `arguments` parameter is an object with two properties: Value and IsValid. 這個參數可讓您取得控制項的驗證，並指出值是否有效的自訂驗證常式為基礎的值。This parameter allows you to get the value of the control to validate and to indicate whether the value is valid based on your custom validation routine. 使用與相關聯的屬性，以指定用戶端驗證指令碼函式名稱控制項。Use the property to specify the name of the client-side validation script function associated with the control. 因為指令碼函式會在用戶端上執行，函式必須在目標瀏覽器支援，例如 VBScript 或 JScript 的語言。Because the script function is executed on the client, the function must be in a language that the target browser supports, such as VBScript or JScript. > [!NOTE] > 當您使用內控制控制，請確定驗證程式控制項以及與其相關聯的控制項是在相同的面板。When you use the control inside an control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel. 如需有關使用控制局部網頁更新，請參閱[局部網頁呈現概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information about using the control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 如同伺服器端驗證，若要驗證的輸入控制項中的字串會使用來存取屬性`arguments`參數。Like server-side validation, the string from the input control to validate is accessed by using the property of the `arguments` parameter. 藉由設定傳回驗證結果屬性`arguments`參數。Return the result of the validation by setting the property of the `arguments` parameter. > [!CAUTION] > 當使用驗證器控制項時，您應該永遠會檢查之前執行任何處理伺服器端驗證的結果。When using validator controls, you should always check the results of server-side validation before performing any processing. 回傳，但之後會呼叫事件方法之前，頁面呼叫驗證程式控制項和彙總至其結果屬性。After a postback but before your event methods are called, the page calls the validator controls and aggregates their results into the property. (您也可以呼叫使用明確的驗證程式控制項`Validate`方法。)在您自己的程式碼中，您應該檢查屬性會傳回`true`之前處理輸入。(You can also call the validator controls explicitly using the `Validate` method.) In your own code, you should check that the property returns `true` before processing input. 即使已啟用指令碼的瀏覽器可能會阻止回傳發生在用戶端上，如果驗證檢查失敗，您永遠也應該檢查處理驗證的資料之前的伺服器程式碼中。Even though script-enabled browsers might prevent a postback from occurring on the client if a validation check has failed, you should always also check in server code before processing validated data. 多個驗證控制項可以搭配個別的輸入控制項，以驗證不同的準則。Multiple validation controls can be used with an individual input control to validate different criteria. 例如，您可以套用多個驗證控制項上控制項可讓使用者輸入加入至購物車的項目數量。For example, you can apply multiple validation controls on a control that allows the user to enter the quantity of items to add to a shopping cart. 您可以使用控制項，以確保指定的值小於清查中的金額和控制項，以確保使用者輸入值到控制項。You can use a control to ensure that the value specified is less than the amount in inventory and a control to ensure that the user enters a value into the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果輸入的控制項是空的沒有驗證函式的呼叫，且驗證成功。If the input control is empty, no validation functions are called and validation succeeds. 使用控制項來要求使用者輸入的輸入控制項中的資料。Use a control to require the user to enter data in the input control. 您可使用不設定控制屬性。It is possible to use a control without setting the property. 這通常是當您驗證多個輸入的控制項或驗證輸入的控制項，不能與驗證的控制項，例如控制項。This is commonly done when you are validating multiple input controls or validating input controls that cannot be used with validation controls, such as the control. 在此情況下，屬性`arguments`參數傳遞至事件處理常式事件和用戶端驗證函式一定會包含空字串 ("")。In this case, the property of the `arguments` parameter passed to the event handler for the event and to the client-side validation function always contains an empty string (""). 不過，這些驗證函式仍會呼叫，適用時，以判斷伺服器和用戶端上的有效性。However, these validation functions are still called, where appropriate, to determine validity on both the server and client. 若要存取要驗證的值，您必須以程式設計方式參考您想要驗證，並從適當的屬性擷取值的輸入的控制項。To access the value to validate, you must programmatically reference the input control you want to validate and then retrieve the value from the appropriate property. 例如，若要驗證控制伺服器上，請勿設定驗證控制項並以下列程式碼的處理常式的屬性事件。For example, to validate a control on the server, do not set the property of the validation control and use the following code for the handler for the event. ```vb Sub ServerValidation (source As object, args As ServerValidateEventArgs) args.IsValid = (CheckBox1.Checked = True) End Sub ``` ```csharp void ServerValidation (object source, ServerValidateEventArgs args) { args.IsValid = (CheckBox1.Checked == true); } ``` 如需有關驗證控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on validation controls, see . ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立伺服器端控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a server-side control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/CS/customvalidatorservervalidatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/VB/customvalidatorservervalidatevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立用戶端控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a client-side control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidatorClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorClient/CS/customvalidatorclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidatorClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorClient/VB/customvalidatorclientvb.aspx#1)]

Protected Overrides Sub AddAttributesToRender (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

param.name: writer
param.span: ，包含要在用戶端呈現的輸出資料流。

span.span: A that contains the output stream for rendering on the client.

summary.span: 將 控制項的屬性加入至輸出資料流以呈現在用戶端上。

span.span: Adds the properties of the control to the output stream for rendering on the client.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫自訂的伺服器控制項中的方法，讓一律會以粗體顯示的錯誤訊息。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that the error message always appears in bold. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_customvalidator_addattributestorendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_customvalidator_addattributestorendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender/CS/custom_customvalidator_addattributestorender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorAddAttributesToRender/VB/custom_customvalidator_addattributestorender.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ClientValidationFunction { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定驗證使用的自訂用戶端指令碼函式名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the custom client-side script function used for validation.

value.span: 用於驗證的自訂用戶端指令碼函式名稱。

span.span: The name of the custom client script function used for validation.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

para.span: 函式名稱不可包含任何的括號或參數。

span.span: The function name should not include any parentheses or parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性設為執行用戶端驗證的函式的名稱。Set this property to the name of the function that performs the client-side validation. 因為用戶端驗證函式在目標瀏覽器上執行，您必須使用支援的瀏覽器中，例如 JScript 或 VBScript 指令碼語言撰寫函式。Because the client validation function runs on the target browser, the function must be written using a scripting language supported by the browser, such as JScript or VBScript. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定執行用戶端驗證的函式的名稱。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the name of the function that performs client-side validation. 驗證函式會檢查偶數。The validation function checks for even numbers. 如需函式參數的說明，請參閱的 < 備註 > 一節。For a description of the function parameters, see the Remarks section of . > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidatorClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorClient/CS/customvalidatorclientcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidatorClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorClient/VB/customvalidatorclientvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool ControlPropertiesValid() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function ControlPropertiesValid () As Boolean

summary.span: 檢查控制項的屬性值是否有效。

span.span: Checks the properties of the control for valid values.

returns.span: 如果控制項屬性有效，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control properties are valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫自訂的伺服器中的方法控制，好讓它永遠會傳回值的 visible 屬性，只要屬性控制項在頁面上，且包含驗證屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always returns the value of the visible property, as long as the property of the control is on the page and contains validation properties. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid/CS/custom_customvalidator_controlpropertiesvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid/VB/custom_customvalidator_controlpropertiesvalidvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid/CS/custom_customvalidator_controlpropertiesvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorControlPropertiesValid/VB/custom_customvalidator_controlpropertiesvalid.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance bool EvaluateIsValid() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function EvaluateIsValid () As Boolean

returns.span: 如果輸入控制項中的值有效，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the value in the input control is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫自訂的伺服器控制項中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_customvalidator_evaluateisvalidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_customvalidator_evaluateisvalidvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid/CS/custom_customvalidator_evaluateisvalid.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomCustomValidatorEvaluateIsValid/VB/custom_customvalidator_evaluateisvalid.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnServerValidate(string value) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function OnServerValidate (value As String) As Boolean

summary.span: 引發 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

returns.span: 如果由 參數指定的值通過驗證，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the value specified by the parameter passes validation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在伺服器上執行驗證時，會引發事件。The event is raised when validation is performed on the server. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及伺服器端的處理常式的程式碼控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for a server-side control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/CS/customvalidatorservervalidatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/VB/customvalidatorservervalidatevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ServerValidate As ServerValidateEventHandler

summary.span: 在伺服器上執行驗證時發生。

span.span: Occurs when validation is performed on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在伺服器上執行驗證時，會引發事件。The event is raised when validation is performed on the server. 此事件用來提供自訂驗證常式的輸入控制項，例如控制項。This event is used to provide a custom validation routine for an input control, such as a control. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及伺服器端的處理常式的程式碼控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for a server-side control. 它會建立自訂驗證常式中，驗證的值數目為偶數的控制項，然後顯示 驗證的結果。It creates a custom validation routine, validates the value of a control for an even number, and then displays the result of the validation. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/CS/customvalidatorservervalidatecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomValidatorServerValidate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomValidatorServerValidate/VB/customvalidatorservervalidatevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ValidateEmptyText { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值 (Boolean)，表示是否應該驗證空白文字。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether empty text should be validated.

value.span: 如果應該驗證空白文字則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if empty text should be validated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個驗證程式可以與目標控制項相關聯。Each validator can be associated with a targeted control. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，如果目標的控制項有空白的字串值，例如屬性的值，驗證程式 (除了驗證程式) 將不會評估目標的控制項和只會傳回驗證傳遞。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, if the targeted control had an empty string value, such as a property having a value of , the validator (except for the validator) would not evaluate the targeted control and would simply return that the validation passed. 屬性是.NET Framework 2.0 版的新功能。The property is new for the .NET Framework version 2.0. 如果設`true`，驗證程式評估控制項的值 (使用指定的準則控制項)，並傳回驗證結果。If is set to `true`, the validator evaluates the control's value (using the criteria specified to the control) and returns the validation results. 這個屬性可讓開發人員評估的結果控制目標控制項的值為何。This property allows developers to evaluate the results of a control regardless of the value of the targeted control. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
